sentences.sContent: The cull of up to 500 animals using tranquillizer darts followed by lethal injection would begin within two weeks, military spokesman Brigadier Andrew Nikolic said.
sentences.sContent_eng: The cull of up to 500 animals using tranquillizer darts followed by lethal injection would begin within two weeks, military spokesman Brigadier Andrew Nikolic said.
sentences.sCn: 即将被捕杀的袋鼠最多有500只。 根据军方发言人Andrew Nikolic的话称，捕杀人员将使用装有镇静剂的投掷物抓捕这些袋鼠，随后再使用致命性注射品，整个杀猎工作将在两周内开始。

trans.tranCn: [医]镇定剂, 使镇定的人或物
trans.tranOther: a drug used for making someone feel less anxious
